SQL.LOAD: SELECT service_center_id, dealer_id, product_code_id, bonus_compute_method_id, bonus_amount_period_month, sc_replacement_pct, sc_avg_tat, pecoramount, priority, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, effective, expiration, claim_bonus_settings_id FROM elp_claim_bonus_settings WHERE claim_bonus_settings_id = :claim_bonus_settings_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST:
SELECT distinct cbs.claim_bonus_settings_id, sc.description as Service_center , d.dealer_name as dealer, pc.product_code as product, dit.translation as compute_bonus_method, cbs.sc_avg_tat, cbs.pecoramount, cbs.priority, cbs.sc_replacement_pct, cbs.bonus_amount_period_month, cbs.effective, cbs.expiration
FROM elp_claim_bonus_settings cbs
left join elp_dealer d on cbs.dealer_id = d.dealer_id left join elp_service_center sc on cbs.service_center_id = sc.service_center_id left join elp_product_code pc on cbs.product_code_id = pc.product_code_id left join elp_list_item li on cbs.bonus_compute_method_id = li.list_item_id left join elp_dict_item_translation dit on li.dict_item_id = dit.dict_item_id
where 1=1 --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_claim_bonus_settings SET service_center_id = :service_center_id, dealer_id = :dealer_id, product_code_id = :product_code_id, bonus_compute_method_id = :bonus_compute_method_id, bonus_amount_period_month = :bonus_amount_period_month, sc_replacement_pct = :sc_replacement_pct, sc_avg_tat = :sc_avg_tat, pecoramount = :pecoramount, priority = :priority, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE claim_bonus_settings_id = :claim_bonus_settings_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_claim_bonus_settings ( service_center_id, dealer_id, product_code_id, bonus_compute_method_id, bonus_amount_period_month, sc_replacement_pct, sc_avg_tat, pecoramount, priority, effective, expiration, created_by, claim_bonus_settings_id ) VALUES ( :service_center_id, :dealer_id, :product_code_id, :bonus_compute_method_id, :bonus_amount_period_month, :sc_replacement_pct, :sc_avg_tat, :pecoramount, :priority, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :claim_bonus_settings_id )
SQL.DELETE: UPDATE elp_claim_bonus_settings SET expiration = sysdate WHERE claim_bonus_settings_id = :claim_bonus_settings_id
